summary: hashim is a red guard, brother kematu find it in the bannered mare of Whiterun can decapitate enemies and you too haha
descriptionHtml:
History:
he was born in Hammerfell with his brother Kematu, was kidnapped by bandits until she was 14 years dedicated himself to stealing with his bandits but one day the stole part of the booty and the leader to learn attempted murder, one day Hashim awake while all the bandits were sleeping wield the scimitar of the leader and began to kill them one by one, escaped from the cave in which resided for a long time and ran in unfamiliar places hunting and killing to survive once you get to an unfamiliar city guards said they were going to be watching and says no crime in their city or with the vera, now resides in Whiterun renting his sword
author: Kanghi
